articles.title: Ministers pledge UK action to ratify high seas treaty by end of year
articles.description: Move comes after efforts at UN ocean summit to establish marine protected areas in international waters
articles.content:
Britain will take action to ratify the high seas treaty by the end of this year, a landmark agreement that will protect marine life in some of the oceans’ most remote waters, ministers have announced.

articles.description: ISLAMABAD: The head of an official delegation visiting London to present Islamabad’s position following a recent military standoff with New Delhi said on Tuesday the United States and the United Kingdom should encourage India to come for dialogue at a neutral location. articles.description: Reductions in income tax slabs, proposal of 18pc levy on imported solar panels as well as on e-commerce platforms, Rs2.5/ltr carbon levy on fossil fuels.
articles.content:

articles.title: Commissioner confirms gardaí made 'controlled delivery' of guns to Carlow gunman
articles.description: Garda Commissioner Drew Harris was speaking at the Oireachtas Justice committee and was questioned about guns obtained by Evan Fitzgerald.
articles.content:
THE MAN WHO died in a shooting incident at a Carlow shopping centre received guns in a controlled delivery by gardaí, the Garda Commissioner has told a Dáil committee.
